title: 5 Signs That Could Be Virgo’s Soulmate

steps.title: Pisces
steps.content: Pisces Pisces is Virgo’s opposite sign. Together, emotional Pisces and analytical Virgo balance each other out, creating a complementary bond. [1] X Research source Pisces can help Virgo open up and trust their intuition, while Virgo can help Pisces get organized to achieve their goals. As mutable signs, both of you are flexible and adapt well to any situation. [2] X Research source Together, you can take whatever the world throws at you! Try something new with intuitive Pisces, like attending a yoga class or sound bath meditation together. Pisces can help you take that leap to broaden your perspective and get in touch with your spiritual side!

steps.title: Capricorn
steps.content: Capricorn Capricorn and Virgo make the perfect power couple. You’re both practical, trustworthy, and responsible earth signs, which lays the foundation for a strong partnership. [3] X Research source Virgo is ruled by Mercury, planet of communication, and Capricorn is ruled by structured, disciplined Saturn. These energies help you communicate and understand each other easily, so you can work together like a well-oiled machine. [4] X Research source If family-oriented Capricorn talks about you with their parents or siblings, it could be a sign they’re interested in you. Capricorns care deeply about status and achievement, so if they’re showing off and trying to impress you, this could be a sign that they’re into you. If you’re dating a Capricorn, talk to them about their goals, and tell them about yours. Achievement-oriented Capricorns will jump at the chance to game plan together.

steps.title: Taurus
steps.content: Taurus Solid, reliable Taurus is another great match for Virgo. [5] X Research source As earth signs, you each understand and appreciate the other’s practicality and grounded nature. Virgos also deeply appreciate consistency, so you’ll take comfort in Taurus’s steadiness and reliability. [6] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Your commonalities and shared interests can make this match a long-lasting one! You also share an interest in food—from a health and nutrition perspective on Virgo’s end, and from an enjoyment and pleasure perspective on Taurus’s. [7] X Research source Try out innovative cuisine at a new restaurant, or cook a delicious meal together to bond. Taurus is ruled by Venus, planet of love, so they deeply appreciate romantic gestures. Surprise Taurus with flowers or take them out on a fancy date to win them over! Reader Poll: We asked 379 wikiHow readers about what quality they value most in a partner and 49% of them said loyalty and dependability . [Take Poll] So it's a great sign that Taurus has such a capacity for reliability and trustworthiness!

steps.title: Scorpio
steps.content: Scorpio Scorpio and Virgo are both introspective deep thinkers, so you’ll be able to spend hours having interesting, meaningful conversations. [8] X Research source Virgo is a practical, grounded earth sign, while Scorpio is an emotionally intuitive water sign. Together, you'll bring new and fascinating perspectives to your exploration of the world’s deepest questions. If you’re a Virgo in a relationship with a Scorpio, you’re bound to share an intense connection! Take Scorpio on an intellectually stimulating date. Wander a museum, watch some live theater, or try out a poetry reading to get the conversation flowing! Scorpio is ruled by Pluto, planet of transformation, and Mars, planet of passion. [9] X Research source This passion coupled with Virgo's depth and intensity makes for a powerful physical connection, as well an intellectual one.

steps.title: Cancer
steps.content: Cancer The helpful nature of Virgo and nurturing nature of Cancer can make for a harmonious match. [10] X Research source You’ll likely have an instant connection, and you’ll bond over your shared love of being helpful to others. [11] X Research source When you turn these nurturing capabilities toward each other, a supportive, comforting relationship can grow. On top of a romantic connection, Virgo and Cancer are likely to share a deep friendship, which can be a strong foundation for a long lasting partnership. Ruled by the moon, Cancer is extremely emotional and sentimental. [12] X Research source Talk about your feelings with them to connect and strengthen your bond!

steps.title: Those with Virgo in the 7th or 8th house make great partners for a Virgo sun sign.
steps.content: Those with Virgo in the 7th or 8th house make great partners for a Virgo sun sign. There are 12 houses in astrology, each representing a different aspect of life. When a person is born, each of the planets was in one of the 12 houses, just like each of the planets was in one of the astrological signs. A partner with Virgo in their 7th or 8th house could be uniquely suited to you. To find out which planets are in someone's astrological houses, create a birth chart using their birth time and location. Virgo in your partner’s 7th house: If your partner has your sun sign in their 7th house, you could be the perfect match. The 7th house is the house of partnerships, and it can determine long-term love compatibility. As a Virgo sun, you could share a magnetic connection with someone who has Virgo in their 7th house. Each of you will likely see the other as an ideal partner, which could lead to a harmonious and romantic match. [13] X Trustworthy Source Mental Health Foundation UK charity working towards good mental health for all. Go to source Virgo in your partner’s 8th house: The 8th house is the house of sex and transformation, and it can determine your sexual chemistry. As a Virgo sun, you could share an intense physical connection with someone who has Virgo in their 8th house. Your deep attraction will likely make you feel inexplicably pulled toward one another. [14] X Research source This could be the basis for a deeply satisfying and transformative relationship!

steps.title: Build your self-esteem.
steps.content: Build your self-esteem. As a perfectionistic Virgo, you’re probably pretty hard on yourself. [15] X Research source You’re tendency to be critical of yourself can push you to achieve great things, but it can also keep you from being confident in romantic interactions. Work on building up your self-worth and silencing your inner-critic so that you can take that leap and fall in love. Recite positive affirmations to build up your self-esteem. Pick a phrase like “I am worthy” or “I deserve love” and repeat it to yourself to show some self-love.

steps.title: Foster your optimism.
steps.content: Foster your optimism. As a practical, analytical Virgo, you might be a bit cynical about romance. [16] X Research source Your meticulous nature helps you succeed with all of your projects and goals, but it can be a bit of a hindrance when it comes to love. Work on opening your heart and believing in the possibility that a soulmate is out there for you. You never know what kind of romantic connection is on the horizon! If you’re struggling to be more optimistic , try spending time with optimists in your life. [17] X Research source Their positive energy can be infectious! Reframe your thinking to help open your heart. Instead of focusing on what could go wrong, focus on what could go right. Come up with a list of all the great things that could happen in your romantic life. Then write a letter to the universe thanking it for these things as if they’ve already happened. This powerful manifestation technique can help you change your mindset and open your heart to all the possibilities out there.

steps.title: Live in the moment.
steps.content: Live in the moment. You might get stuck in your head sometimes, which can keep you from enjoying the moment. You’re a meticulous problem-solver, but focusing so much on fixing things can be a distraction when it comes to love. [18] X Research source You might feel the need to point out and fix the one speck on the canvas, rather than stepping back to admire the whole painting. Work on living in the moment to help you appreciate things as they come. Practice mindfulness to help you live in the now. Mindfulness involves focusing on what you’re feeling in the present moment while avoiding judging yourself. [19] X Trustworthy Source American Psychological Association Leading scientific and professional organization of licensed psychologists Go to source Try out mindful meditation . This mindfulness technique can reduce stress and promote physical wellbeing. [20] X Trustworthy Source American Heart Association Leading nonprofit that funds medical research and public education Go to source Sit down in a quiet place and focus on what you’re directly experiencing. Feel the flow of your breath, and let any thoughts that come up pass without judgment. [21] X Research source

steps.title: Reel in criticisms.
steps.content: Reel in criticisms. Virgos have a bit of a reputation for pointing out others’ flaws. [22] X Research source As a problem-solving Virgo, you love to fix things and put them in order, so you might offer advice on things your partner should change to achieve their goals. [23] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source Even though your heart is in the right place, this can come across as overly critical or controlling to your partner. If you feel the urge to criticize your partner, take a pause before making any suggestions. Is your partner already aware of what went wrong? Can they figure out how to move forward on their own? If the answers are yes, take a breath and refrain from calling them out. They’ll appreciate your patience and understanding!

steps.title: Compliment their intellect.
steps.content: Compliment their intellect. Virgos are intelligent and analytical, but they tend to be more introverted. [24] X Research source Let them know that you admire their intellect to help get them out of their shell. If they love to read, ask them about their favorite books. If they’re into science, ask them what they like about it. Showing interest in Virgo’s intellectual endeavors is a great way to let them know you care.

steps.title: Tell them they look great.
steps.content: Tell them they look great. Self-critical, perfectionist Virgos take great care with their appearance. [25] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Business Review Online and print journal covering topics related to business management practices Go to source Compliment them to show that you’ve noticed their efforts. Remember, a person’s appearance can be a sensitive thing. Compliment their outfit choice or personal style, rather than a physical trait on their body, to show appreciation without being invasive. “You have such a cool style. I love the way you put your outfit together!” “Is that a new shirt? It looks great on you!”

steps.title: Cook a meal together.
steps.content: Cook a meal together. Virgos are deeply interested in nutrition and taking care of their bodies through food. [26] X Research source Cooking a nutritious meal together could be the perfect way to bond, and it will show your Virgo partner that you care about their interests. Do some research and pick a delicious, nutritious recipe to follow. Pick up the ingredients you’ll need beforehand. Practical Virgo will love that you’ve thought everything out and prepared in advance! While you cook together, spend the time conversing and connecting.

steps.title: Go on an active date.
steps.content: Go on an active date. Because Virgos are so invested in their health, an active, outdoorsy activity could be the perfect setting to connect. [27] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Go on a scenic hike , play volleyball on the beach, or go on a bike ride together. Your Virgo partner will enjoy the health-focused activity, and they’ll appreciate your thoughtfulness.

steps.title: Solve problems together.
steps.content: Solve problems together. Virgos are meticulous problem-solvers. They love working on puzzles and cleaning up messes. [28] X Research source If you’re dealing with a problem in your personal life, ask your Virgo partner to help you through it. Virgos love to feel useful and needed, and they’ll jump at the chance to help you problem-solve. Tackling things together as a team will also help bring you closer together.

steps.title: Be patient.
steps.content: Be patient. Virgos like to have control, so they might fall in love more slowly. [29] X Research source They could be hesitant to surrender to their feelings, and they'll likely take a while to open up. Be patient with Virgo as they learn to let their guard down, and show them that you’re consistent and trustworthy through your actions. Do your best to show up on time . Meticulous Virgos are all about the details, so they’ll notice and appreciate it when you’re punctual. Stay true to your word. This will help show your Virgo partner that you’re reliable, which could help them open up to you.
